title: Which server should i be on?
body: Just needing a little help, i'm living in New Zealand at the moment and trying to figure out which server is bes tto be on, atm i'm hitting around 230 ping on NA.

replies.body:
You'll probably want to play on OCE, as that's where all my kiwi friends play. The server is hosted out of Australia, so you'll want to watch out for drop bears! ;)

I hope this helps, please let me know if you have any questions.
